title: TROUBLE Is Working On The Follow-Up To 2013's The Distortion Field, Played Their First Show In Two Years
description: "We're ready to get this thing going and give everybody a quality Trouble record. It's been a long time." The post TROUBLE Is Working On The Follow-Up To 2013's The Distortion Field, Played Their First Show In Two Years appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
